select dt.canUseCount+dt.repairCount totalcount,dt.canUseCount,dt.ownUseCount,dt.freeCount,dt.repairCount,dt.overnightCount,dt.dayCount, dt.clockCount,dt.saleCount,dt.occupancyRate,dt.avgRoomPrice,dt.pevPar,dt.overnightFee, dt.dayAmount,dt.clockAmount,dt.handRoomFee,dt.roomFeeAmount,dt.silverCardCount,dt.silverCardAmount, dt.goldCardCount,dt.goldCardAmount,dt.goodsSale,dt.fuwuFee,dt.totalAmount, dt.startBalance,dt.todayReceived,dt.startNoPay,dt.startBookDeposit, dt.endBalance,dt.todayExpend,dt.endNoPay,dt.endBookDeposit,
dt.todayVIPCount,dt.todayVIPPercentage,dt.todayVIPRoomFee,dt.todayVIPAvgRoomPrice, dt.walkingCount,dt.walkingPercentage,dt.walkingRoomFee,dt.walkingAvgRoomPrice, dt.agreementCount,dt.agreementPercentage,dt.agreementRoomFee,dt.agreementAvgRoomPrice, dt.agencyCount,dt.agencyPercentage,dt.agencyRoomFee,dt.agencyAvgRoomPrice, dt.CRSCount,dt.CRSPercentage,dt.CRSRoomFee,dt.CRSAvgRoomPrice,
dt.todayVIPCount+dt.walkingCount+dt.agreementCount+dt.agencyCount+dt.CRSCount totaljianye, dt.todayVIPPercentage+dt.walkingPercentage+dt.agreementPercentage+dt.agencyPercentage+dt.CRSPercentage totalpercentage, (dt.todayVIPRoomFee+dt.walkingRoomFee+dt.agreementRoomFee+dt.agencyRoomFee+dt.CRSRoomFee)/(dt.todayVIPCount+dt.walkingCount+dt.agreementCount+dt.agencyCount+dt.CRSCount) totalAvgRoom, dt.todayVIPRoomFee+dt.walkingRoomFee+dt.agreementRoomFee+dt.agencyRoomFee+dt.CRSRoomFee totalRoomFee,
dt.xianJin,dt.yinHangKa,dt.yuShouQuan,dt.yuShouQuanOK,dt.zhiPiao, dt.huiKuan,dt.diYongQuan,dt.chuZhiKa,dt.shangLvKa,dt.guaZhang,dt.wangFu, dt.jiFen,dt.dianZiQuan,dt.guaFangZhang,dt.mianDan,dt.zhiFuBao, dt.xianJin+dt.yinHangKa+dt.yuShouQuan+dt.yuShouQuanOK+dt.zhiPiao+ dt.huiKuan+dt.diYongQuan+dt.chuZhiKa+dt.shangLvKa+dt.guaZhang+dt.wangFu+ dt.jiFen+dt.dianZiQuan+dt.guaFangZhang+dt.mianDan+dt.zhiFuBao paymoneyTotal from dayreport dt where dt.shopID = #{shopID} and dt.atime = #{atime}
select dt.atime,dt.roomFeeAmount from dayreport dt where dt.shopID = #{shopID} and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{oneweek})>=0 and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{real_time})<=0 GROUP BY dt.atime
select dt.atime,dt.roomFeeAmount from dayreport dt where dt.shopID = #{shopID} and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{twoweek})>=0 and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{real_time})<=0 GROUP BY dt.atime
select dt.atime,dt.roomFeeAmount from dayreport dt where dt.shopID = #{shopID} and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{onemonth})>=0 and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{real_time})<=0 GROUP BY dt.atime
select dt.atime,dt.roomFeeAmount from dayreport dt where dt.shopID = #{shopID} and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{starttime})>=0 and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{endtime})<=0 GROUP BY dt.atime

select sum(dt.canUseCount)+sum(dt.repairCount) totalcount,sum(dt.canUseCount) canUseCount,sum(dt.ownUseCount) ownUseCount, sum(dt.freeCount) freeCount,sum(dt.repairCount) repairCount,sum(dt.overnightCount) overnightCount,sum(dt.dayCount) dayCount, sum(dt.clockCount) clockCount,sum(dt.saleCount) saleCount,
sum(dt.saleCount)/(sum(dt.canUseCount)+sum(dt.repairCount)) occupancyRate,sum(dt.roomFeeAmount)/sum(dt.saleCount) avgRoomPrice,sum(dt.roomFeeAmount)/(sum(dt.canUseCount)+sum(dt.repairCount)) pevPar, sum(dt.overnightFee) overnightFee,sum(dt.dayAmount) dayAmount,sum(dt.clockAmount) clockAmount,sum(dt.handRoomFee) handRoomFee,sum(dt.roomFeeAmount) roomFeeAmount, sum(dt.silverCardCount) silverCardCount,sum(dt.silverCardAmount) silverCardAmount,sum(dt.goldCardCount) goldCardCount,sum(dt.goldCardAmount) goldCardAmount, sum(dt.goodsSale) goodsSale,sum(dt.fuwuFee) fuwuFee,sum(dt.totalAmount) totalAmount,sum(dt.startBalance) startBalance,sum(dt.todayReceived) todayReceived, sum(dt.startNoPay) startNoPay,sum(dt.startBookDeposit) startBookDeposit,sum(dt.endBalance) endBalance,sum(dt.todayExpend) todayExpend, sum(dt.endNoPay) endNoPay,sum(dt.endBookDeposit) endBookDeposit,
sum(dt.todayVIPCount) todayVIPCount,sum(dt.todayVIPCount)/sum(dt.saleCount) todayVIPPercentage,sum(dt.todayVIPRoomFee) todayVIPRoomFee,sum(dt.todayVIPRoomFee)/sum(dt.todayVIPCount) todayVIPAvgRoomPrice, sum(dt.walkingCount) walkingCount,sum(dt.walkingCount)/sum(dt.saleCount) walkingPercentage,sum(dt.walkingRoomFee) walkingRoomFee,sum(dt.walkingRoomFee)/sum(dt.walkingCount) walkingAvgRoomPrice, sum(dt.agreementCount) agreementCount,sum(dt.agreementCount)/sum(dt.saleCount) agreementPercentage,sum(dt.agreementRoomFee) agreementRoomFee,sum(dt.agreementRoomFee)/sum(dt.agreementCount) agreementAvgRoomPrice, sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0)) agencyCount, if(sum(IFNULL(dt.saleCount,0)) = 0,0,sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0))/sum(IFNULL(dt.saleCount,0))) agencyPercentage,sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyRoomFee,0)) agencyRoomFee, if(sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0)) = 0,0,sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyRoomFee,0))/sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0))) agencyAvgRoomPrice, sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0)) CRSCount,sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0))/sum(IFNULL(dt.saleCount,0)) CRSPercentage,sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSRoomFee,0)) CRSRoomFee, if(sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0)) = 0,0,sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSRoomFee,0))/sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0))) CRSAvgRoomPrice,
sum(IFNULL(dt.todayVIPCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.walkingCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agreementCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0)) totaljianye, (sum(IFNULL(dt.todayVIPCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.walkingCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agreementCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0)))/sum(IFNULL(dt.saleCount,0)) totalpercentage, (sum(IFNULL(dt.todayVIPRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.walkingRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agreementRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSRoomFee,0)))/(sum(IFNULL(dt.todayVIPCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.walkingCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agreementCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyCount,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSCount,0))) totalAvgRoom, sum(IFNULL(dt.todayVIPRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.walkingRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agreementRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.agencyRoomFee,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.CRSRoomFee,0)) totalRoomFee,
sum(IFNULL(dt.xianJin,0)) xianJin,sum(IFNULL(dt.yinHangKa,0)) yinHangKa,sum(IFNULL(dt.yuShouQuan,0)) yuShouQuan,sum(IFNULL(dt.yuShouQuanOK,0)) yuShouQuanOK,sum(IFNULL(dt.zhiPiao,0)) zhiPiao, sum(IFNULL(dt.huiKuan,0)) huiKuan,sum(IFNULL(dt.diYongQuan,0)) diYongQuan,sum(IFNULL(dt.chuZhiKa,0)) chuZhiKa,sum(IFNULL(dt.shangLvKa,0)) shangLvKa,sum(IFNULL(dt.guaZhang,0)) guaZhang,sum(IFNULL(dt.wangFu,0)) wangFu, sum(IFNULL(dt.jiFen,0)) jiFen,sum(IFNULL(dt.dianZiQuan,0)) dianZiQuan,sum(IFNULL(dt.guaFangZhang,0)) guaFangZhang,sum(IFNULL(dt.mianDan,0)) mianDan,sum(IFNULL(dt.zhiFuBao,0)) zhiFuBao, sum(IFNULL(dt.xianJin,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.yinHangKa,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.yuShouQuan,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.yuShouQuanOK,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.zhiPiao,0))+sum( IFNULL(dt.huiKuan,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.diYongQuan,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.chuZhiKa,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.shangLvKa,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.guaZhang,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.wangFu,0))+sum( IFNULL(dt.jiFen,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.dianZiQuan,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.guaFangZhang,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.mianDan,0))+sum(IFNULL(dt.zhiFuBao,0)) paymoneyTotal from dayreport dt where dt.shopID = #{SM_HotelId} and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{thismonthAtimeStart})>=0 and DATEDIFF(dt.atime,#{thismonthAtimeEnd})<=0
